alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 1:36AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, eastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 215 AM EDT/115 AM CDT/... At 136 AM EDT/1236 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marianna to near Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Marianna, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Grand Ridge, Altha, Alford, Moose Pond, Dirego Park, College Station, West Panama City, Camps Head, Bahama Beach, Bennett and Porter Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
